author: elecharny
msg: A working version of the chat example. The code is still awfully buggy (432 errors), but at least, I get the chat working.
o We have now two chains : incoming and outgoing
o We still use index to go through the chains
o The stack is limited to the exact number of filters, no more indirection is needed
o There is something strange in the way data are written. I have to get deeper into this part.
o I have removed all the chainBuilder classes
